# track طُرُق ṭuruq طْريق ṭrīq the.rêge ڕێگە

Central root of a many-branched linguistic tree:

𒋻 TAR track > tillaˣ > callaˣ ≈ galaxis 𒋻 TAR track ≈ ˢtrack Strecke شَارِع šāriʕ सड़क saṛak 𒀭𒀹𒀭 #sūqu سكّة sekka

drag trag
dice duce dào 道 doceō teach docket document token < take < trag track 道 > 𓈍 tag 𓏴 > ✓ tick ticket ⇔ title tablet tread treat tret tram trample 𓇼 𓏏 𓇳 Tag 𒌓?

𒁺𒍑 du-us₂ 𒄭𒍑 du₁₀us₂ ≈ τρίβος tríbos track? <> friend

𒁺 DU/RE₆ 𒁽𒁽 দৌৰা doura "run" @ track

track *dorga доро́га doróha 도로 doro road reversed

tract ⇔ direct 𓂧 𓏏 𓏤
track طُرُق ṭuruq سكّة sekka सड़क saṛak Strecke ⇔ straight
track ط ر ق ṭ-r-q דֶּרֶךְ dérekh “road” सड़क
track ^trogma δρόμος drómos droga доро́га doróha 도로 doro 道路 どうろ dōro road راه râh rue ル ru lu!

• Arabic طرق (ṭrq) : Hebrew דרך (drk̠) with Sanskrit ध्रँज् (dʰrãj) (nom.sing. ध्रजस् (dʰrajas)) : Armenian Դարգ (drag) (compare : դուրգն (dourgn) "potter's wheel") [To Drag ; To Pave Way]

د و ر d-ov-r √tour circling دَائِرَة dāʾira “circle” track … … …
ذ ر ق dh-r-q dreck:dung
د م ن d-m-n dung @ 𓏠 𓈖 𓃒
د ق ع d-q-æ dug:soil

𒂃 TUḪᴿ ≈ TIR in 𒂃𒆸 ≈ 𒌁𒆸 TIR.KÙ® track, tread

𒋻 esirra :
𒋻 TAR track
𒋻 KU course
𒋻 SILA calla

the.rêge vs ma.rêge reach regel 𓂾:

MURGU 𒈱𒋞 ⇔ मार्ग mārga (road) march ⇔ Meer?
MA.EGIR 𒈱 길 gil ڕێگە rêge орук oruk < سڑک saṛak street
𓈘 = maroadan 𓐝 𓂝 𓏏 𓈖 𓌙 𓈐 𓂻 ⇔ 𓈘𓊢𓏏𓉐=𓅓𓊢𓏏𓉐 mastaba

road rodh 𓈘 रोड roḍ raster रास्ता rāstā

drag trag crag carriage
dura drag träge

Xeno branches:
targa : ⋍channel
Tuareg

𒁲𒀀𒋗 di-a-šu
𒁲𒀀𒋗 to tread down

draw < drag trag ⇔ track ⇔ treib
𒁕𒇻 da-ru
𒁕𒇻 draw (a needle or pin), water drawer, roam around, to move

𓍿 𓈖 tkan in 𓅓 𓍿 𓈖 𓈐 matkaⁿ track
